The Pacific Ocean is larger than the Atlantic Ocean.
The Suez Canal connects the Red Sea and the Indian Ocean.
The source of the Nile River is in Egypt.
The Amazon River is the longest river in the Americas.
Lake Baikal is the world\'s oldest and deepest freshwater lake.
The Rhine River flows through Germany.
Antarctica is the coldest continent on Earth.
The Great Barrier Reef is located off the coast of Australia.
Jupiter is the largest planet in our solar system.
Water boils at 100 degrees Celsius at sea level.
The sum of the angles in a triangle is always 180 degrees.
The Great Wall of China was built during the Ming Dynasty.
Mount Everest is the highest mountain in the world.
The United Nations was founded in 1945.
The first programmable computer was developed in the 1940s.
Humans have 206 bones in their bodies.
Light travels faster than sound.
The chemical symbol for gold is Au.
William Shakespeare wrote "Hamlet."
Vincent van Gogh painted "Starry Night."
Ludwig van Beethoven was a famous composer.
The Olympic Games are held every four years.
"Titanic" won the Academy Award for Best Picture in 1998.
Elephants are the largest land animals on Earth.
Mandarin Chinese is the most spoken language in the world.
Harry Potter is a book series written by J.R.R. Tolkien.
The telephone was invented by Thomas Edison.
Sushi originated in South America.
Mercury is the largest planet in our solar system.
The Eiffel Tower was built in the 18th century.
French is the official language of Brazil.
Pi is a rational number.
Penguins can fly.
Michael Jackson composed the song "Imagine".
Cycling is not an Olympic sport.
